pages.text: Follow these steps to set yourself on the right path towards realizing your full potential in Amethyst Imbuement:$(li)Gather important base ingredients$(li)Craft an Imbuing Table and begin setting up bookshelves around it$(li)Set up a mob farm or other method to gather experience

pages.title: Base Items to Gather
pages.text: $(l)$(l:amethyst_imbuement:gems/amethyst)Amethyst:$() Find in a Geode or go mining for quartz in the Nether!$(br)$(l)$(l:amethyst_imbuement:gems/quartz)Quartz:$() Key in many recipes. Get that Nether Portal humming!$(br)$(l)$(#490)Crying Obsidian:$() Find this in ruined portals.$(br)$(l)$(#490)Flowers:$() Most base crystals need flowers. Find in various fields and forests.

pages.title: Imbuing Table
pages.text: $(l)$(l:amethyst_imbuement:altars/imbuing_table)Imbuing Table:$() This enhanced enchanting table is the central workstation of the mod. Crafting one is top priority.$(br)$(l)$(#490)Multiblock:$() Like the enchanting table, bookshelves placed in a ring around the table improve its capabilities. Read more in the link above.

pages.title: Experience Farm
pages.text: You will need a LOT of XP!$(br)$(l)$(l:amethyst_imbuement:imbuing/xp_bush_seed)Experience Bush:$() These bushs grow $(l:amethyst_imbuement:imbuing/bottle-o-enchanting)Bottles-o'-Enchanting$() for you! Imbue up some of these. $(br)$(l)$(l:amethyst_imbuement:enchantments/new_weapon_enchants#insight)Insight:$() Enchanting your main weapon with this will churn out experience.$(br)$(l)$(#490)Mob Farm:$() A classic Minecraft endeavor. You may want to set one of these up to farm XP.
